response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible deal while maximizing the value we get for our product. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
